creator: ganeshs@india.hp.com
text:
When the following query :
select   NAME,CREATED,LOG_MODE, CHECKPOINT_CHANGE#,"+
	  "ARCHIVE_CHANGE# from     sys.v_$database
is executed from servlet, the following error is displyed in the browser:
HTTP Status 503 - Servlet org.apache.catalina.INVOKER.Database_Information is 
currently unavailable
The requested service (Servlet org.apache.catalina.INVOKER.Database_Information 
is currently unavailable) is not currently available.

creator: funkman@joedog.org
text:
Need a working test case to rerpoduce this. Otherwise -please use tomcat-user to
debug.
